title: Reviving separatist terrorism in Sri Lanka: Doors wide shut; Treacherous forces will be crushed:
content: Army Commander Lieutenant General Jagath Jayasuriya yesterday assured that no room would be allowed for the uprising of any treacherous forces within Sri Lanka whatever the inimical forces who may raise their heads in the international sphere.
